job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWere building fullyelectric farm machines for sustainable and regenerative agriculture We have received a National Science Foundation SBIR grant to do research on computer vision for understanding plant geometry This is a challenging problem in farm fields where many plants can overlap and occlude one another Were looking for a remote software developer to help with building and running the software involved in this research The grant period is 9 months but if the project goes well there is a good chance that the work will continue after thatppbrppRequirementspulliexperience with Cliliexperience with Pythonliliexperience with image processing andor computer vision algorithmsliliexperience with PyTorch andor TensorFlowlilibased in USliulpbrppOptionalpulliexperience with developing and running machine learning models on AWSliliexperience with OpenCVliulpbrppTo apply please send a resume along with a link to some C andor Python code that you have writtenppbrppCompensation 117kyear for 9 months plus health insurancep
